description:
Striker is the Machine Caliber that http://anidb.net/ch52527 [Kugel] pilots. It`s a more high-tech model than http://anidb.net/ch51232 [Chamber], and often used by commanding officers of the Galactic Alliance of Humankind. It comes equipped with the "Pilot Support and Development Interface System" and uses it to gather and organize the information needed for its pilot to act.
Source: ANN
name: Striker
